title: Exploring MOOC Learning Culture: A Virtual Ethnographic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Exploring MOOC learning culture in blended environments and facilitating learner interaction through project-based courses

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three cultural characteristics present in MOOC learning environments.
Learners can analyze interaction patterns with peer learners using virtual ethnographic methods.
Learners can propose improvements for learning communities by applying the concept of MOOCocracy (social learning democracy).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
